message:
If by "Is there a way to avoid that?", you mean, "Is there a way to have ConfigureAwait(false) be the default?", then no, there is not. This has been considered a few times by the MS team (compiler flag, etc), but it has always been rejected.

However, it should be possible to do that with a post-compile step, something like PostSharp. I don't know if anyone has done anything like that.
